name: Mancala ++ HD
description:
Mancala ++ HD is very simple, just taking you few minutes to learn. However, it's not easy to master.

Mancala, called Sowing games in English, famous in the world, especially popular in Africa and central Asia. The word Mancala comes from the Arabic word naqala meaning literally Moved. Now, we offer you Mancala with iPad version, try it!


Rules：

Except for sowing games, this old board game also has many other names, such as count and capture, kalah,oware,endodoi,awale and wari.

In this game, players begin by placing a certain number of seeds in each of the pits on the game board. Players take turns to sow. In the process of sowing, all the seeds from a hole are dropped one-by-one into subsequent holes in a motion wrapping around the board. When one player no longer has any seed in his holes, the game ends. The player with the most seeds in designated hole wins the game.


Features

1. Three levels: Easy, Med and Hard, meeting needs of all players.

2. Undo function.

3. Enable to load game progress.Auto-save when exit or phone ring.

4. Challenging computer or play with your friend on the same device, can also play against a friend via bluetooth on two devices.

5. In Game Center, free to play with friends or anyone online.

6. Excellent user interface and exciting sound effects.

7. Free to choose seed number(3-6).


How long may you spend to master Mancala ++ HD? Don't be hesitate to challenge yourself!
